about_the_game:
Story

"Nothing special will ever happen in my life. Reality is unbearably predictable and cold."

Hae-eun, a high school student who doesn’t believe in fantasies, enrolls in a boarding school aiming for a simple and peaceful existence. But before she even adjusts to the new semester, she begins to hear strange mysteries circulating around the school.

At first, Hae-eun scoffs at the seemingly fantastical rumors. But her roommates’ eyes sparkle with curiosity.

To prove that the world isn’t nearly as interesting as it’s made out to be, Hae-eun decides to roll up her sleeves and uncover the truth behind these mysteries.

With her ever-curious roommates, Da-hee, Se-rin, and Min-young, Hae-eun gains sharp allies and reliable partners on her journey.

How to Play

Players become high school students and must solve various mysteries happening at school. During the day, they gather clues through investigation and observation with their friends, and at night, they gather in Room 502 for deduction sessions. Everything Hae-eun sees, hears, and feels becomes a potential clue. Players can capture small words, subtle traces, and suspicious sights to test hypotheses and uncover the full story behind the incidents. Can the newcomers of Room 502 unravel the charming mysteries of Myeongseo High School?

Daytime Activities

Clue Collection

  • Observe the surroundings carefully to gather physical evidence.

  • Obtain information through conversations with friends.

  • Record suspicious behaviors or peculiarities.

Investigation

  • Converse with related individuals to collect information.

  • Observe each location's unique characteristics and changes.

  • Analyze the connections between discovered clues.

Nighttime Activities

Room 502 Deduction Meetings

  • Organize and categorize the collected clues.

  • Share discoveries and discuss findings with others.

  • Develop hypotheses and verify them.

Gameplay Features

  • Gather clues from all available information.

  • Systematically classify and store collected clues.

  • Piece together the truth of the incidents based on the gathered evidence.

  • Use logical reasoning to approach the full story.

  • Analyze the relationships between clues to draw conclusions.

short_description: A cynical high schooler, Hae-eun's mundane life takes a colorful turn as she and her dorm roommates in Room 502 unravel mysterious incidents on campus. This game blends academy life, mystery, and youth in a captivating detective adventure.
